title: Vial of Fire Breath
contents: text | You open your mouth and a gout of flame rushing out. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10 + your proficiency bonus). A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

title: Vial of Comprehend Languages
contents: text | For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must be touching the surface of which the words are written. It takes about 1 minute to read one page of text. This effect doesn't decode secret messages in a text or glyph, such as an arcane sigil, that isn't part of a written language.

title: Vial of Detect Evil and Good
contents: text | For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place of object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated. The effect can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

title: Vial of Detect Magic
contents: text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any. The effect can penetrate most barriers, but is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

title: Vial of Detect Poison and Disease
contents: text | For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case. The effect can penetrate most barriers, but is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

title: Vial of Divine Favor
contents: text | Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Until the effect ends, your weapon attacks deal and extra 1d4 radiant damage on a hit.

title: Vial of False Life
contents: text |  Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4+4 temporary hit points for the duration.

title: Vial of Guiding Bolt
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage

title: Vial of Heroism
contents: text | you are immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus at the start of each of its turns. When the effect ends, you lose any remaining temporary hit points from this effect.

title: Vial of Inflict Wounds
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you, make a melee attack against the creature.
text | On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

title: Vial of Jump
contents: text | Your jump distance is tripled until the effect ends.

title: Vial of Longstrider
contents: text | Your speed increases by 10 feet until the effect ends.

title: Vial of Ray of Sickness
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 10 + your proficiency bonus). On a failed save, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.

title: Vial of Speaking with Animals
contents: text | You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their intelligence, but at minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past day. You might be able to persuade a beast to perform a small favor for you, at the DM's discretion.

title: Vial of Thunder Breath
contents: text | A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from your mouth. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 10 + your proficiency bonus). On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell's effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.
